_header: We readeth oft and findeth I-write
Note: Opening lines almost identical to the Prologue of Sir Orfeo: See 6172.

NLS1921.First Lines:
We redeþ oft & findeþ ywrite& þis clerkes
                    wele it wite…
NLS1921.Note:
320 lines, ends imperfectly due to loss of leaf, of which only a stub
                    remains (f. 262a).
